TASK_EXTRACT_VALUES.instillShortDescription: Extract values from the HTML content.

html.description: The HTML content to extract values from. It can be .html file or raw HTML string.
html.title: HTML

selector.description: The CSS selector to extract values from the HTML content. Please check [CSS Selector Examples](#css-selector-examples).
selector.title: Selector

values.description: The extracted values from the HTML content.
values.title: Values

TASK_FILTER_DATA.instillShortDescription: Filter data based on the given selectors.

html.description: The HTML content to filter data from. It can be .html file or raw HTML string.
html.title: HTML

selectors.description: The CSS selectors to filter data from the HTML content. Please check [CSS Selector Examples](#css-selector-examples).
selectors.title: Selectors

html.description: The html that has been filtered based on the given selectors.
html.title: HTML

TASK_CONVERT_TO_MARKDOWN.instillShortDescription: Convert HTML content to Markdown with filtering data by given selectors.

html.description: The HTML content to convert to Markdown. It can be .html file or raw HTML string.
html.title: HTML

selectors.description: The CSS selectors to filter data from the HTML content. Please check [CSS Selector Examples](#css-selector-examples).
selectors.title: Selectors

markdown.description: The Markdown content converted from the filtered HTML content.
markdown.title: Markdown
